channel.title: Comments on: Rolling Restarts and 2.0.5 Patch Notes

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description:
European Rolling restarts were flawless, the servers booted people at 12pm sharp (or 11 my time being in good ol' blighty) I was playing 1min later by stealthing up and sprinting through the massive battle raging at the portal, I zoned in and it was lag free untill I logged out.
I must say that it was quite suprising as the night started off badly with having to patch the last 209 (ish) meg patch again, luckily I hadn't deleted it and it patched straight away, but there was a final 2mb patch that took about 30 mins on the crappy patcher before i was patched good to go. The account upgrade page was available about 2 hours before hand so most people were activated and ready to go on the restart.
First impressions were good, good quest idea's (still some of the kill 5 of this 5 of that come back) and the rewards for someone who's not been raiding were fantastic (I found legs almost as good as Bloodfang without the on it on the 3rd quest I was doing). We had a good explore around the first zone and found from 57-64 mobs along with our first instance.
item.content:encoded:
European Rolling restarts were flawless, the servers booted people at 12pm sharp (or 11 my time being in good ol’ blighty) I was playing 1min later by stealthing up and sprinting through the massive battle raging at the portal, I zoned in and it was lag free untill I logged out.

I must say that it was quite suprising as the night started off badly with having to patch the last 209 (ish) meg patch again, luckily I hadn’t deleted it and it patched straight away, but there was a final 2mb patch that took about 30 mins on the crappy patcher before i was patched good to go. The account upgrade page was available about 2 hours before hand so most people were activated and ready to go on the restart.

First impressions were good, good quest idea’s (still some of the kill 5 of this 5 of that come back) and the rewards for someone who’s not been raiding were fantastic (I found legs almost as good as Bloodfang without the on it on the 3rd quest I was doing). We had a good explore around the first zone and found from 57-64 mobs along with our first instance.

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description: *crosses fingers for midnight installation and play*
item.content:encoded: *crosses fingers for midnight installation and play*
